TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed XmlSerializationFixupCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub XmlSerializationFixupCallback(fixup As Object)
type XmlSerializationFixupCallback = delegate of obj -> unit

param.name: fixup
param.span: 类的一个实例，包含要链接的对象和待填写项的字符串标识符数组。

span.span: An instance of the class that contains the object to be fixed and the array of string identifiers for the items to fill in.

summary.span: 类用来反序列化 SOAP 编码的 XML 数据的委托。

span.span: Delegate used by the class for deserialization of SOAP-encoded XML data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为.NET Framework 对象，反序列化的 XML 文档，时.NET Framework XML 序列化基础结构动态实例化实现的修复方法委托。While deserializing XML documents into .NET Framework objects, the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure dynamically instantiates fix-up methods that implement the delegate. 基础结构那么的 SOAP 编码的数组，其数据类型映射到.NET Framework 引用类型。The infrastructure does so for SOAP-encoded arrays whose data types map to .NET Framework reference types. 然后，根据需要，修复方法调用来填充数组中的对象。Then, as necessary, a fix-up method is called to fill in the objects in the array. 此外，在初始化过程，.NET Framework XML 序列化基础结构动态生成并编译临时类，用于反序列化派生自类。In addition, during initialization, the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure dynamically generates and compiles a temporary class for deserialization derived from the class. 在此过程中，该基础结构生成SOAP 编码的多引用 XML 数据的方法。During this process, the infrastructure generates methods for SOAP-encoded, multi-referenced XML data. 然后反序列化期间调用的方法。The methods are then invoked during deserialization. 不直接创建的实例类。Do not directly create an instance of the class. SOAP 编码为 SOAP 1.1 规范的第 5 节中所述。SOAP encoding is described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
